Industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software
Description:
xiQ’s Personality-driven Sales and Marketing Platform™ combines neuroscience, psychology, and AI to understand the buyers’ mindset and the factors that influence their purchasing decisions. Our award-winning, proprietary AI platform delivers personality insights, comprehensive account intelligence, and real-time, curated content right to your team’s fingertips so they can build trust and close deals faster.  ​

Our large enterprise customers have engaged their audiences 10x better as compared to traditional marketing channels, saved thousands of hours of research time, and achieved up to 24% higher close win rates.  ​
​
Key capabilities of xiQ’s proprietary AI-powered platform:    ​

* Personality-driven insights for one-to-one sales playbooks ​

* SmartSourced Content™ that drives 10x engagement​

* First-party intent data and advanced analytics to individualize every interaction​

* Instasites (microsites designed for individualized experiences)  ​

* Comprehensive all-in-one company profiles compiled in seconds   ​

* Sales triggers and real-time alerts direct to your inbox  ​

* Outlook, Salesforce, MS Teams, and social media integration   ​
​

Experience xiQ at xiQinc.com.

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Broadcast Media
Description:
Winmo is the leading Sales Intelligence Software helping Disney, The NFL, TikTok, Reddit, Wavemaker, R/GA, Omnicom, WPP, Hulu, Digitas, Salesforce, Kern and many more. Winmo helps sales teams with connecting the dots between brands, agencies and the executives who control their purse-strings, Winmo paves a clearer path to engaging the right decision-makers at the right prospects. Integrated news, recommendations and alerts, sales teams can track known opportunities, identify new leads, and execute their outreach for optimal results.

Other uses for Winmo can be found here: https://www.winmo.com/why-winmo/problems-we-solve/

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Information Technology and Services
Description: All-in-one lead generation & sales acceleration platform that helps automate your customer acquisition with data-driven experiments, making failure impossible.

Industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services
Description:
Dealfront is the Go-to-Market Platform that gives sales and marketing teams everything they need to win leads and close deals.

As the joint merger of Germany’s Echobot and Finland’s Leadfeeder, Dealfront’s algorithms and applications access data and insights that other tools can’t, while offering transparency and complying with Europe’s strict and complex regulations.

Dealfront combines the tools and stages of the sales and marketing process into a single platform, powering a flywheel that optimizes your entire go-to-market operation in a perpetual loop.  The result is constantly refined accuracy, ICPs that are dynamic and real-time, and more leads that end in deals.

Industries: Information Technology and Services
Description:
Draup is an AI-powered Sales Intelligence platform that empowers sales teams with comprehensive account and stakeholder intelligence to enable microtargeting.

Draup’s Sales Intelligence helps enterprise sales teams:

*Identify prospects & opportunities that match your ideal client attributes
*Build comprehensive Account Plans with no overhead
*Micro-target with relevant messages and sales offerings
*Nurture and engage clients and prospects with hyper-contextualized insights
*Proactively monitor the ecosystem (clients, prospects, partners, and competitors)
*Understand outsourcing requirements & trends
*Extract emerging digital intentions 
And more...

Visit Draup.com/sales to learn more about Draup’s Sales Intelligence Offerings

Industries: Computer Software, Marketing and Advertising
Description:
With Leadinfo you can recognize B2B website visitors with our global database of 220M companies in over 200+ countries. Our users say we have the EASIEST product, MOST integrations, and BEST customer service. 
Request a free trial of 14 days to see for yourself!
Languages Supported: Danish, German, English, French, Dutch, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish
HQ Location: Capelle aan den IJssel, South Holland

Industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software
Description:
Enlyft helps B2B sales & marketing teams find, prioritize, engage and convert the companies most likely to buy their products through dedicated AI and deep proprietary account data.

We enable you to discover best fit accounts among tens of millions of companies worldwide by targeting technology adoption and hundreds of business attributes. Our AI platform predicts who needs your technology products and when they are ready to buy. What's more - Enlyft gives your teams access to business critical insights about each account in seconds - for confident, targeted and effective outreach.

We do this by combining sales & marketing optimized AI models with proprietary data collection mechanisms to generate the richest, most reliable and up-to-date database of prospect data in the market. Enlyft is a seamless part of your workflow through easy-to-use website, plugin, data downloads, LinkedIn contacts, CRM integrations and much more.

From Fortune 100 to startups - world's most productive sales & marketing teams rely on Enlyft's AI driven demand generation to power and prioritize their prospecting pipeline and win more business - for a fraction of their budget.

Industries: Marketing and Advertising
Description:
A single workspace for your company's relationships. LeadDelta helps you organize and engage your network so that you can become proactive about your most valuable asset – your connections.

With LeadDelta, you will obtain a CRM view of your and your team's professional network. LeadDelta allows you to import your LinkedIn connections into the platform and use tools like tagging, notes, inbox, templates, bulk messages, filters, data unlocking, 1-click export, Zapier integration, and more to nurture, grow and utilize your network.

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Computer Software
Description:
Signals is a lead generation and AI Platform that helps you know who is on your website, and leverage their behaviors, to engage with visitors who are ready to buy.  

We have already helped companies find thousands of qualified new contacts without visitors needing to fill out a form.

Industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services
Description:
SalesIntel is a full-funnel SaaS solution that helps sales and marketing teams easily identify high intent accounts and find contact information for key decision-makers.

We provide business intelligence using proprietary data and patented technology. Our combination of automation and researchers allows us to reach 95% data accuracy for all our published contact data while continuing to scale up our number of contacts. With our team of approximately 1,900 researchers, we re-verify our contacts every 90 days. We provide 100% email coverage for all of our human-verified contacts and have the highest number of mobile numbers and direct dials in the industry. We even offer a one-of-a-kind service, Research-on-Demand, for completing specialized verification requests.

With SalesIntel, your sales and marketing teams can also enrich your current contacts to keep your CRM accurate. Our enrichment tool integrates seamlessly with the techstack you already use to run enrichment automatically. You will improve connection rates with human-verified direct-dial phone numbers and email addresses. Our Intent Data offering is powered by Bombora. Here you can easily find accounts scoring high on topics related to your product and services and prioritize organizations already looking for a solution like yours. Our Intent Data quickly allows your prospects to jump through the buying stages and shorten your sales cycle.

Utilize the VisitorIntel tool to find buyers who are looking for your products and services right now. Immediately access industry-leading direct dials and mobile phone numbers for decision-makers at companies that have visited your website, saving your sales team countless research hours. You can focus your sales team directly on building revenue and closing deals.

Filter our data by purchase intent, technographic, firmographic, location, industry, job level, department, title and more. Or, use RevDriver, our Free Chrome extension, to access SalesIntel’s contact data while visiting a prospect’s website or LinkedIn profile.

If you would like contact data on a unique industry or have a special request, our Research on Demand team is standing by to find what you need as quickly as possible. 

With the most comprehensive contact and company data and our excellent customer service, SalesIntel is your partner in growth.

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Computer Software
Description: CloudLead uses machine learning tools backed by human researchers to help B2B sales and marketing teams scale their outbound processes. With CloudLead businesses can identify new customer leads, update & improve existing lead database and setup managed outbound email processes.

Industries: Staffing and Recruiting, Information Technology and Services
Description:
Swordfish is the world's most powerful contact search engine. 

Swordfish aggregates data from the world's top people identity verification providers such as Hoovers, Dun & Bradstreet, Experian and hundreds of other independent sources & live feeds to bring you up-to-date, valid, direct contact information for the people you are looking for. 

Swordfish is used by the world's top recruiters, sales and investigative professionals at the world's leading defence, tech and government agencies. From Fortune 500 Executive recruiters to solo entrepreneurs, Swordfish is on your side to make your contact sourcing efficient, accurate & easy to use.

Our 4 products are designed to make life easier..

Chrome Extension
- Find any contact data on the web

File Upload
- Save time by bulk enriching customer lists

Deep Search Engine
- Find anyone based on the input data

API
- Add the power of Swordfish data through our API tool

Industries: Computer Software, Logistics and Supply Chain
Description: At etailinsights, our research team and proprietary web crawlers source new eCommerce Leads for you, so that you can focus on crafting the right messages and winning more Online Retail clients. Our in-house research team finds and profiles eCommerce and fulfillment decision-makers at over 500,000 online retail companies. We have built a directory of all the major eCommerce brands, and our executive profiles often include an email address, direct phone line, relevant social media profiles and more.

Users: Major Accounts District Manager, Regional Sales Executive
Industries: Computer Software, Human Resources
Description:
PartnerTap is a data-driven discovery platform for partner revenue. PartnerTap gives partner, channel, and sales teams everything they need to automate account mapping, share partner pipeline in real-time, identify new whitespace sales opps, and start co-selling with partners. 

Enterprise customers use PartnerTap to get an ecosystem-wide view of their market and scale up revenue with partners and through resellers.

PartnerTap data can be pushed instantly back into your CRM with 100% native integrations, no third-party tools required. 

100% 5-star reviews on the Salesforce AppExchange and Hubspot Marketplace.

Industries: Financial Services, Banking
Description: RelPro delivers a unique combination of smart prospecting, quality leads and targeted intelligence for sales, marketing and business development professionals. We analyze data on more than 150 million decision-makers and 7 million companies from trusted sources, social networks and the web. Through SaaS and Data Services solutions, RelPro enables organizations to find leads and generate actionable intelligence on executive-level relationships efficiently and systematically. RelPro is a trusted partner to leading companies, non-profits and universities.

Industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services
Description: HG Insights is the authority in Technology Intelligence, delivering data-driven Go-To-Market insights to 90% of Fortune 100 B2B tech companies. Our proprietary Technology Intelligence – granular insights into IT installations, spend, contract, and Intent, paired with cloud product usage, adoption, and spend – delivers enhanced productivity, allowing global businesses to analyze markets and target prospects with precision and confidence. Using our market-leading solutions, including the HG Platform, Market Intelligence, Contextual Intent, Functional Area Intelligence, Cloud Dynamics, HG Salesforce Connector, HG for Capital Markets, and LinkedIn Connector; HG customers achieve unprecedented results in their marketing and sales programs.

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Market Research
Description:
Technology Empowering Potential

At AroundDeal, we are proud to be the leading sales and marketing intelligence and engagement platform. We provide comprehensive and accurate data on business contacts and company information from all over the world, boasting over 110 million records, with a particular focus on emerging markets. Our cutting-edge technology allows us to crowdsource data, ensuring maximum coverage and accuracy. 

Our mission at AroundDeal is dedicated to being a customer-centric and technology-driven company. Empower our customers, users, and partners in all industries to work less, achieve more, and sell smarter, guiding them toward success beyond their imagination. 

We provide comprehensive & accurate data on business contacts and company information from all over the world, boasting over 110M records, with a particular focus on emerging markets.

1. Prospector -
Find Your Next Customer with Better Data
Quickly build targeted prospect lists with 100M+ contacts data & receive alerts when contacts change jobs.

2. Engagement -
Automate Your Sales Engagement
Build automated sales sequences and take your sales opportunities to the next level.

3. Chrome extension -
Find Leads Everywhere
Get targeted contact and company information directly on LinkedIn, Company website and CRM (Salesforce or HubSpot）.

4. Enrichment -
Enrich Your Data Automatically
Enrich your records with 50+ firmographic fields in the AroundDeal database, including business email, phone, title, company name, and more.

5. Visitors -
Turn Website Visitors into Qualified Leads
Find out what companies are visiting your website and engage them the right way at the right time.

Industries: Financial Services, Logistics and Supply Chain
Description:
Trusted by Fortune 500 companies across the globe, TAMI (standing for Total Addressable Market Intelligence) is the world’s leading market intelligence, competitor monitoring and sales lead generation platform helping marketing and sales professionals to access their entire market in seconds.

TAMI’s unique patented platform identifies over 750 million industry contacts from more than 161 million companies across the globe, generating more contacts and more unique insights than any other provider. 

Our data is fully GDPR compliant with an unbeatable bounce back rate of less than 5%, compared with an industry average of over 20%.

Industries: Legal Services, Accounting
Description:
Born from the frustration of trying - and failing - to utilize CRM to discover who knows who, Introhive is an award-winning software company that boosts B2B enterprises with a 360-degree view into their customer intelligence, making it easier to identify selling opportunities, win more new business, and grow existing customer accounts

With Introhive's platform, customers are removing needless friction from their revenue-generating processes & unlocking new levels of growth. 

Introhive is your trusted companion along the revenue transformation journey.

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Information Technology and Services
Description:
FindThatLead is an all-in-one lead generation platform that helps companies and individuals find the professional contacts they are looking for, generate leads, verify emails, manage their customer portfolios as a CRM and establish mass email communication. 

With Findthatlead you can:

- Generate segmented and qualified lists of prospects.

- Get anyone's email in just one click.

- Verify emails automatically.

- Personalize and send cold emailing campaigns.

- Enrich your database.

This Barcelona-based startup stands out for its team of +10 experts in the sector and for the constant innovation of its tool, which always brings the most advanced features to its users.

Industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services
Description: Demandbase Sales Intelligence Cloud, formerly InsideView Insights, injects Account Intelligence into every step of your sale, so you can sell smarter and leave your competitors wondering what happened. Sales Intelligence Cloud puts our Account Intelligence at your fingertips — inside Microsoft Dynamics 365, Salesforce, or your browser — so you can find more of the right prospects at the right time, engage with them on a deeper level, and win more — all faster and easier than ever.

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Publishing
Description: MediaRadar's award-winning advertising intelligence solutions deliver timely cross-media insights that are targeted to those that are involved in the media selling, planning, or buying processes. Agencies and marketers use MediaRadar to create the best media mix, monitor their competitors, and uncover new advertising opportunities.

Description: Outbound's sales intelligence platform is the top B2B prospecting tool with strong data worldwide but is known for its high volume, highly accurate data in EMEA.  The app uses the best technology and complicated machine learning & artificial intelligence algorithms to ensure our users get only the most validated and accurate data on their prospects.

Industries: Staffing and Recruiting, Marketing and Advertising
Description:
Kendo is a B2B prospecting suite that helps find and validate personal and business emails and phone numbers from the Internet, so you can find and connect with the right people for your business. 
Kendo features include email and phone lookup extension, bulk email search, email verification, search by company/domain, reverse email lookup, multiple CRM integrations, powerful API and more.
Kendo free plan provides 50 credits monthly, forever.

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Information Technology and Services
Description:
Nimble is the industry-leading CRM for Office 365 and G Suite that builds award-winning contact management solutions for teams and individuals. 

It does all the work by integrating with productivity apps such as inboxes and calendars, delivers a streamlined user experience, and was built to help business teams close more deals, faster. 

Nimble unites thousands of small to mid-sized business teams successfully nurture their personal and business relationships across email, social networks and more than 90 cloud-based business applications. 

Ranked #1 in Overall Satisfaction by G2 Crowd, and #1 Small Business Sales and Marketing CRM by Fit Small Business, Nimble combines the strengths of traditional CRM, classic contact management, social media, sales intelligence and marketing automation into a powerful relationship management platform that delivers relationship insights everywhere you work. 

Sign Up for a Free Trial: Nimble.com

Industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services
Description: Triblio’s Account-Based Marketing (ABM) platform orchestrates marketing and sales campaigns at every stage of the purchase journey. In a single platform, Triblio combines account-based advertising, web personalization, and sales activation features to orchestrate campaigns across multiple channels. These campaign tools and analytics run on a proprietary AI-powered purchase intent engine that scores account interest during the buying journey. Triblio can orchestrate ABM campaigns to grow awareness, engagement, and pipeline within their target accounts. To learn more, visit www.triblio.com.

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Computer Software
Description:
The key strategy in generating predictable revenue is building a predictable pipeline. Sales VPs of some of the biggest Fortune 1000 companies use Autoklose daily, to achieve this.

Autoklose is the first email outreach software with an integrated B2B database filled with over 8 million verified B2B leads. Awarded for its intuitive and easy-to-use interface, Autoklose reduces the onboarding time to a minimum making your sales reps happy and focused.

• save 3 hours per day, per sales rep.
• sync seamlessly with your existing sales stack.
• use real-time reporting & analytics.

Trusted by market leaders and growing businesses. Autoklose is built for entrepreneurs, sales, and marketing. 

Autoklose helps you and your teams:
* Target — the right prospects by utilizing our huge database packed with clean, verified B2B leads from different industries and applying a number of different powerful filters.
* Engage — your prospects and convert them into loyal customers by sending out sequences of highly tailored emails at scale, fine-tuning your campaigns real time, and automating your sales process.  
* Grow — your business by managing your teams, monitoring the performance of your campaigns and each individual team member, analyzing reports directly from your dashboard, and following a simple formula – test, improve, repeat, and thrive.

Be bold. Start klosing with a k.
AUTOKLOSE.

Industries: Computer Software, Marketing and Advertising
Description: FullContact is a privacy-safe Identity Resolution company building trust between people and brands. We deliver the capabilities needed to create tailored customer experiences, improve ad targeting along with measurement as well as improve identity verification and fraud solutions by unifying data and applying insights in the moments that matter.

Industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services
Description: Bombora’s offering identifies which businesses are currently researching what topics and the intensity of those efforts. It scores these signals to then help sales and marketing teams prioritize target accounts, customize their conversations with them, and optimize marketing efforts. Bombora delivers its greatest value to organizations with 100+ employees.

Industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software
Description:
Vainu is a highly-rated leader in the sales intelligence software space, providing B2B businesses with best-in-class company information.

Vainu has the best possible coverage of business in the Nordics and the most advanced company profiles on a global scale.

Vainu's comprehensive company database comprises over 75M+ company profiles enriched with firmographics, technographics, trigger events, and proprietary data points you won't find anywhere else, such as exact industry classifications. 

Currently, Vainu helps over 1100 organizations find and focus on the best business opportunities and ultimately grow their bottom line. Vainu's advanced delivery methods and plug-and-play CRM Connectors with HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive, and Dynamics CRMs make integrating valuable company insights into your sales and marketing systems and workflows a simple process. 

In the Nordics, we also provide contact data sourced from official registries and open online sources. In addition, for the Finnish and Swedish markets specifically, we provide human-verified decision-maker data adhering to GDPR compliance rules when collecting these records.

With Vainu, you'll always have the necessary information to plan and execute effective sales and marketing initiatives at scale —without any hassle.
Languages Supported: Danish, English, Finnish, French, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish

Industries: Computer Software, Marketing and Advertising
Description:
Functioning as a contact hub, our TechTarget Contact Data Services originating from Oceanos™ ingest streams from a network of partners including traditional data companies, publishers and social media sources. 
 
When provided with your list specifications, our List Optimizer™ searches deep within each account for the best possible contacts to meet your objectives. By supporting you with more contacts to begin with, we can help maximize your TAM – the foundation for building out all of your broad-based sales and marketing initiatives.

Industries: Financial Services, Information Technology and Services
Description:
FullCircl is a Customer Lifecycle Intelligence (CLI) platform that helps B2B companies in financially regulated industries do better business, faster. Its solutions allow front and middle office teams to win the right customers, accelerate onboarding and keep them for life. Best-in-class data enrichment provides a comprehensive customer view and a powerful, low-code rules engine reduces the regulatory burden and drives greater automation. Through its web application and API, FullCircl drastically reduces the cost to acquire and serve the right business customers. 

FullCircl was formed following the merger of Artesian Solutions and DueDil. Backed by top tier investors including Octopus Investments, Notion Capital, Augmentum Fintech and notable angel investors, FullCircl brings together decades of combined experience serving UK financial institutions. Today, it serves more than 600 customers and 15,000 users.

Industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services
Description:
Amplemarket is the platform to help you sell in today's environment. From lead generation to personalized multichannel outreach and smart actions, Amplemarket improves your sales team’s performance and increases revenue! 

Here's what you get:

- Data native: Easily find the data that helps you close deals
- Built-in personalization: 3x your response rates with hyper-personalized messages 
- Multi-channel outreach: Email, Phone, LinkedIn, etc.
- AI-powered: Let reps focus on selling while AI takes care of the rest

Industries: Public Relations and Communications, Market Research
Description:
Spark strategic decisions with a global news database and powerful research platform.

Every day and in every industry, there is an intensifying demand for the latest news, contextual content, rich data and powerful research tools that deliver insights and inform strategy. Power strategic business decisions with Factiva’s global news database, deep archives and research platform. Factiva’s premium sources—74% of which are not available on the free web—include exclusive access to The Wall Street Journal, Dow Jones Newswires and Reuters, plus licensed publications, influential websites, trade magazines and regional papers from around the world. With company information and robust search, filtering, smart indexing and sharing tools, you’ll have the power to cut through complexity to the solution.

Visit: www.dowjones.com/factiva

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Information Technology and Services
Description:
Clodura is an AI-powered lead generation platform. It helps you generate highly targeted sales-qualified leads. You get unlimited access to clean B2B prospect data of more than 220 million contacts & 18 million companies. With more than 120 million direct dial numbers, it gives you the power to reach out to your prospects faster. Clodura's actionable sales intelligence triggers and automated sales cadence help you book more qualified meetings and grow revenue faster. Winning sales teams worldwide use Clodura to effectively target their Total Addressable Market and accelerate their sales.

In Clodura.AI's Org Chart feature, the sales teams can accurately identify and target key decision-makers within an organization. The Org Chart feature enables the sales and marketing teams to create focused and effective sales and marketing campaigns. Knowing the prospect better inevitably results in closing deals faster and more effectively. Clodura.AI provides a comprehensive calling feature that integrates with users' CRM and adds tasks and follow-ups. Tracking leads and strategizing the next step with actionable insights at one's disposal is seamlessly incorporated into Clodura's platform. Clodura.AI also provides 95% accuracy on emails and direct-dials whose database is frequently updated. Users can connect to their leads effortlessly within minutes, thus saving endless time reaching the appropriate contacts. With Clodura.AI, users get technographic information about companies, including installing base intelligence for 15,000+ technologies, allowing them to map customers' tech landscape to their offerings.

Specialties - Verified emails & direct dial numbers, Real-Time sales intelligence, Automated sales sequences. Org Charts, Qwikmail

Start your free trial at  https://www.clodura.ai/app/#/auth/register
Book A Demo at https://www.clodura.ai/request-demo/

Industries: Computer Software, Marketing and Advertising
Description:
Growbots created the first all-in-one outbound sales platform. Enjoy automatic lead generation and managing email drip campaigns with CRM integration. All you need to do is set up a customer profile and schedule an email campaign to automatically generate new sales opportunities.

Access 200 million high-quality contacts and send email drip campaigns with help from outbound experts!

Hundreds of companies scale outbound with Growbots - here's what they say: 

- "Fastest and easiest platform I've ever used for lead gen"
- "Growbots is the best thing to happen to our sales efforts"
- "We've seen a 10x increase in sales demos thanks to Growbots"
- "Growbots beats competitors in terms of overall ROI"
- "The volume and quality of contacts is impressive"
- "Database and email automation in one place - that's awesome!"
- "Growbots is a game-changer for any B2B company"

Industries: Marketing and Advertising
Description:
RampedUp is a trusted global business solution for marketers. We help our customers keep their database clean, current, and compliant with over 680 million contacts and 55 million company records, and 8000 Technographics. 

Sellers use RampedUp to help them drill deep into their targeted accounts to find direct dials, email addresses, new alerts and social profile links on decision makers. Our tools are also integrated with Salesforce.com and LinkedIn to make their jobs easier and more productive.

LeadGenius uses machine learning and a global network of human researchers to help B2B sales and marketing teams scale their outbound processes. The world's fastest growing companies use LeadGenius to find and connect with lasting customers.

LeadGenius offers 3 primary services to B2B sales and marketing teams which can be used separately or as one end-to-end solution: Custom Lead Generation, Lead Enrichment and Managed Email Outreach.

With LeadGenius, businesses can identify new customers, update and improve an existing lead database, and remove time-consuming steps from outbound email.

Industries: Computer Software
Description:
RightBound is the only solution that turns  the complete sales development journey into an autonomous process, enabling your sales reps to focus on warmed up leads that are more-likely-to-convert, , increasing ROI for sales development teams of all sizes.

AUTO-PILOT PROSPECTING
Our AI engine continuously delivers new prospects with verified contacts into your CRM via automated processing of multi-source data based on a granular ICP.

AUTONOMOUS MULTI-CHANNEL OUTREACH        
RightBound’s autonomous outbound engine selects the right channel, message, CTA, timing and frequency for each individual based on their behavior. 

SELF-TUNING & OPTIMIZATION
RightBound constantly analyzes the complete sales development journey and autonomously optimizes the entire sales process in real time based on performance.

Industries: Computer Software
Description:
OceanFrogs is a sales intelligence platform that allows you to go to market in a week or less. Intent data, Technology usage tracker, lead scoring to allow B2B marketers/sales to figure out their addressable market. 
 
OceanFrogs takes pride in providing international data (APAC, Japan, India, and the USA). We track more than 9000 technologies, 1000 intent topics, and more than 10 million companies worldwide.

OceanFrogs provides search by teams, products, and services in a way that it brings the focus to the refined list of companies that you want.

OceanFrogs platform has been in use to identify the right customers and to identify the right partners (also). You could build the channel partners and customer pipeline both.

Automation Anywhere, Wipro, Palo Alto, Enate, 42Gears, MontyCloud are some of our customers. We work with large enterprises as well as small companies. 

We started in 2017. We have served marketing/sales in many verticals such as cloud, RPA, information security, talent management, and analytics. Our customers are focused on product and services companies. Our primary customers are the ones that are targeting international customers, want to focus on personalized outreach.

Industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services
Description:
PipeCandy is a market intelligence platform with insights on a million+ eCommerce & D2C brands.

CPG & D2C brand owners & eCommerce managers use our insights to track digital channels (D2C & marketplaces), category trends & consumer perceptions.

Product managers of eCommerce, adtech & fintech use our data to build analytical applications.

High performing sales teams at tech & 3PL companies use our data to do TAM research and to build relevant lead lists.

We are Nielsen+ZoomInfo for eCommerce.

Industries: Staffing and Recruiting, Marketing and Advertising
Description:
Buzz is the Frictionless Sales Engagement Platform for Revenue Teams. 

Busy teams need an all-in-one sales technology that allows them to engage more prospects and close more deals without experiencing software exhaustion. By combining core outreach and lead generation channels with Buzz's powerful B2B contact database your team can easily streamline their most important prospecting activities.
Microsoft Relationship Sales brings together LinkedIn Sales Navigator and Microsoft Dynamics 365 Sales to empower sellers to drive more personalized and meaningful engagement with buyers.

Industries: Information Technology and Services, Marketing and Advertising
Description: Skrapp.io is an email lookup and business data enrichment tool for B2B sales outreach and email marketing. We are collecting and crafting public data to provide an advanced prospecting email research platform that helps professionals launch performant email marketing & outreach campaigns and gain valuable data about their potential recipients.

Industries: Computer Software, Information Technology and Services
Description: RollWorks, a division of NextRoll, offers ambitious B2B companies of any size an account-based platform to align their marketing and sales teams and confidently grow revenue. Powered by machine learning and an extensive account data foundation, the RollWorks platform helps you identify your target accounts, engage them with digital ads, web personalization, email signatures and sales automation, and finally, measure the effectiveness of your programs. RollWorks is an indispensable platform for marketing and sales teams large and small who believe that an account-based approach is just good B2B marketing. Get started today at www.rollworks.com.

Industries: Government Administration, International Trade and Development
Description: Gazelle.ai is the first and only AI-Powered sales intelligence platform that deploys custom-built algorithms to rank over 8 million international companies on their likelihood to expand. Gazelle.ai represents a brand new approach to marketing and business development by focusing on leads that are active buyers of goods and services: Growth Companies. Deployed by users in more than 15 countries, Gazelle.ai has transformed the lead generation process. The days of static, un-intuitive list building are done. Engage with C-level decision-makers at the world’s fastest-growing companies. Start your journey with our AI-generated growth scores and combine these with hundreds of other “growth” filters including: VC funding, fast revenue growth, key company events, industry heatmaps, clustering intelligence, emerging keywords search, among many others. Spend more time closing and less time chasing with the world’s first and only AI-powered company growth platform: Gazelle.ai.

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Information Technology and Services
Description:
Sales.Rocks is a leading Sales Enablement and Automation Platform with a mission to transform everyday Sales & Marketing. The project was founded in Rotterdam, The Netherlands late 2018 with a team of 10. 

The Platform provides company and contact data with high accuracy. It works based on an advanced filtering system including 50+ data filters. It gives a full overview of a company profile detailing basic company information, sales signals, technologies, and contact details. 

The Sales.Rocks Database gives full profiles for 115M+ Companies and more than 200M+ Contacts from 241+ Countries and territories worldwide.

We combine different tools to provide a full automation platform to whole Sales and Marketing Teams and simplify their everyday activities with advanced drip campaigns and LinkedIn automation. We help SDRs find their leads for initial outreach, enable Account Executives to engage in conversations using hyper-personalization, and assist Account Managers with upselling by using smart sales triggers.

With the rest of the individual tools Sales.Rocks gives the option to verify emails and phone numbers and includes a Chrome extension for faster extraction of company and contact data from a website, which makes it an all-in-one solution for sales and marketing teams.
Languages Supported: Danish, German, English, French, Italian, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish

Industries: Marketing and Advertising, Information Technology and Services
Description:
Klarity® - Save time with One-Click Prospecting™.

Klarity is B2B prospecting tool that allows you to build and view prospect lists with varying levels of features. The best prospecting tools are backed by data cleaning and enrichment processes that ensure the contacts you end up with are valid and reachable.
 
As of the beginning of 2023, we have over 88,000,000 contact records in our system from over 1.5 million companies worldwide.
 
Our goal is to be the industry leader regarding data accuracy. If we fail to reach that goal on a file you export from our system, we have policies in place to refund for those records.
 
DemandScience has developed a Chrome extension that connects to Klarity when you are browsing profiles on LinkedIn. Simply click the widget and it will pull information directly from our database. This will unlock additional details about the person’s profile you are viewing including contact details they may not have included on their profile.

We make your job easier.
